Class DataProvider

java.lang.Object
DataProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DataProvider extends Object implements Serializable
DataProvider object used to open files and provide data to main program.
Author:
Name: Damian Curran, Student ID: 1331249

      Constructor of the DataProvider class.

      memberFile - The filename of the member file, String.
      billBile - The filename of the bill file, String.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when file cannot be accessed.
      DataFormatException - Exception thrown when file contents are improperly formatted and cannot be read.

    • billExists

      public boolean billExists(String billId)
      Check if a billId exists in the data. Used during bill checks prior to adding new entries.
      Parameters:
      billId - String of bill to check.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean, true if the bill exists in the data.

    • validMember

      public boolean validMember(String memberId)
      Check if a member is valid. Checks if a member id from a bill matches a member Id in the member list Used during bill checks prior to adding new entries.
      Parameters:
      memberId - String of member to check.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean, true if the member id on the member list.
